title: What Euromillions jackpot winner can do with their £170m and who they are richer than
text:
Get the biggest money stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

As the final number was drawn in Tuesday night's Euromillions draw, a single ticket-holder won the mind-blowing £170,221,000 jackpot.

They instantly became richer than Adele, Harry Kane or Cheryl Cole - and the Duke and Duchess of Sussex.

And they have Boris Johnson to thank for about £1million of the hefty prize.

That's because the jackpot is calculated in euros, and the pound crashed yesterday morning after he revealed what was said in a phone call he had with Angela Merkel.

(Image: Getty)

Andy Carter, Senior Winners' Advisor at The National Lottery, said: "One incredibly lucky ticket-holder has scooped tonight's enormous£170million Euromillions jackpot.

"They are now the UK's biggest ever winner. Players all across the country are urged to check their tickets as soon as possible."

The previous record win was £161million, won by Colin and Christine Weir in 2011.

Yesterday's winning numbers were 07, 10, 15, 44 and 49 and the lucky stars were 03 and 12.

Who they're now richer than

(Image: SWNS.com)

As well as being the richest lottery winner ever, the jackpot will make the lucky ticket holder richer than Spurs striker Harry Kane, Cheryl Cole and Ed Sheeran combined.

In fact, the money is enough to make them better off than any celeb under 30 in the UK, according to Heat magazine's most recent rich list.

They'll also be wealthier than Helen Mirren, as well as the Duke and Duchess of Sussex.

It's also more money than Britain's richest sportsperson - which is currently Rory McIlroy with £138million according to the Sunday Times.

And picking the winning numbers is also enough to make you more money than any surviving member of Queen, with Brian May the best off at £160 million, despite the cash boost they all got from the release of the Bohemian Rhapsody film last year.

Incredible things they can buy

(Image: Getty Images)

Here's just some of what you can buy with all that money:
description: The UK's latest Euromillions jackpot winner can live a life they only dreamt of before after instantly becoming richer than Adele, Harry Kane or Cheryl Cole
